page.title: 05CHRISTCHURCH PRIORY CHURCH
page.content: THE PRIORY CHURCH IS ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT BUILDINGS IN CHRISTCHUCH AND THE TOWN IS ACTUALLY NAMED AFTER IT. YOU CAN SEE THE CHURCH AS YOU ENTER THE TOWN, PARTICULARLY FROM THE EAST, AND MANY TOURISTS VISIT IT EACH YEAR BECAUSE OF ITS MANY INTERESTING FEATURES. THERE ARE SERVICES EVERY DAY AND THREE ON SUNDAYS AT WHICH THE CHOIR SINGS. THE PRIORY IS A VERY POPULAR VENUE FOR WEDDINGS. THE PRIORY CHURCH OF ENGLAND PRIMARY SCHOOL HOLDS ITS BEGINNING AND END OF TERM SERVICE, HARVEST FESTIVAL AND CAROL SERVICE THERE AND THE VICAR VISITS THE SCHOOL EACH WEEK TO TAKE ASSEMBLY. SOME OF THE CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES ATTEND THE MONTHLY FAMILY EUCHARIST SERVICES AT THE PRIORY, OTHERS GO TO THE DAUGHTER CHURCHES OR OTHER DENOMINATIONS AND SOME DO NOT GO TO CHURCH AT ALL.
